shape_3_per_frame1=i=2*instance;
shape_3_per_frame2=
shape_3_per_frame3=x=gmegabuf(i);   y=gmegabuf(i+1);
shape_3_per_frame4= 
shape_3_per_frame5=zoom=.007;
shape_3_per_frame6=x= .5+zoom*x/q6;      y= .5+zoom*y;
shape_3_per_frame7=
per_frame_init_1=i=0;   
per_frame_init_2=loop(10000,  gmegabuf(i)=0;
per_frame_init_3=i=i+1;);
per_frame_1=wave_a=0;   warp=0;        decay=0;   
per_frame_2=zoom=1;     q6=aspecty;    t=2*time;
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=/// iterative equations
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=x=0;   y=0;   i=0;
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=loop(1024,             sample=i/1024;
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=s = 5.5*6.28*sample;     p=(20*sample)%2;
per_frame_11=
per_frame_12=x = x + sin(s+t)* p ;
per_frame_13=y = y + cos(s+t)* (1-p) ;
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=gmegabuf(2*i)=x;       gmegabuf(2*i+1)=y;
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=i=i+1;);
